text: yeojadeulgwa jasondeulgwa sandeomicheoleom ssah-in magdaehan yang-ui geum-eunbohwawa noh-ameog-in malgwa gachuggwa gyeongjagji deung yogmang-e daehan salang-i ingandeul-ege milyeohi chijangdoeeossnola. geugeos-eun hyeonseeseoui salm-ui yuhuila. hullyunghan gwichagjineun hananim geubunkke issnola
